cards.question: What is "drug concentration which induces death in 50% of animals treated with the drug"?
What is "Thearpeutic Index (TI) "?
cards.answer: Measure of safety of drug, larger the TI the safer.

cards.question: What is "Median Toxicity Dose (TD50)"?
cards.answer: Concentration of drug which produces a specific side/toxic effect in 50% of animals treated with the drug.
